mapper.select:
select
from apply_orders order by createdate asc
mapper.insert: insert into apply_orders (id, message, createdate, lastchangedate, orderstatus, creator, processor, lastchangeby) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastchangedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastchangeby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update apply_orders set message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastchangedate = #{lastchangedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, orderstatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processor = #{processor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastchangeby = #{lastchangeby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from apply_orders where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by createdate asc
